thread.title: Robert Arteaga
thread.title_full: Smart Start, Inc. reviewed by Robert Arteaga

author: Robert Arteaga
title: Robert Arteaga
text: Bobbie was very helpful,sincere and thorough ! It's a rare thing to get great service nowadays. And to be honest I did not expect this from an alcohol monitoring company at all.. Thanks for helping out and making this issue I had with the installation a good experience.
